summary: This document is an email chain from September 2019 regarding a request for Jeffrey Epstein's death certificate and autopsy report to close his case. The correspondence involves a U.S. Marshal seeking these documents from the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner (OCME), with a mention of a potential form about Epstein's suicidal tendencies.

persons.name: Florence Hutner
persons.role: General Counsel for the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner (OCME)
persons.context: Identified as the correct contact at OCME to provide the requested autopsy report and death certificate for Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased individual, subject of the case
persons.context: The case being closed pertains to him. There is a mention of a potential form he may or may not have signed regarding suicidal tendencies.

events.title: Mention of potential suicide risk form
events.description: An email mentions that the U.S. Marshals may have a form that Jeffrey Epstein may or may not have signed noting he had suicidal tendencies, and this was reported to have happened around August 1, 2019.

events.title: Initial request for death documents
events.description: A U.S. Marshal sends a request for subpoenas to obtain Jeffrey Epstein's death certificate and autopsy report to close his case.

events.title: Follow-up on document request
events.description: Follow-up emails are sent regarding the status of the request for Epstein's death certificate and autopsy report, with a referral to Florence Hutner at OCME.

locations: New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene
New York City Office of Chief Medical Examiner
keyFacts: A U.S. Marshal was seeking Jeffrey Epstein's death certificate and autopsy report in August-September 2019 to formally close his case.
The correspondence indicates the request was directed to the New York City Office of the Chief Medical Examiner (OCME).
Florence Hutner is identified as the General Counsel for OCME and the correct point of contact for these documents.
There is a reference to a potential form, possibly from around August 1, 2019, regarding Epstein having suicidal tendencies, which the Marshals may have possessed.
